title: Two Windows to Mystery

panel_structure.description: Psyche as magnificent stained-glass window exploding outward, ayahuasca visions bursting through in kaleidoscopic sacred geometry, violent beauty of breakthrough
Mind as theater backstage, hypnosis as gentle footsteps through neural corridors, blueprint of consciousness being quietly explored with reverent curiosity

transformation_notes: The two panels create a visual philosophy of consciousness explorationâ€”showing how violent breakthrough and gentle investigation are simply different methodologies for encountering the same fundamental mystery.
